ItemTooltips.blink: One very important core item. This allows you to blink in and immediately silence the enemy + hold them in place with your ultimate.
ItemTooltips.mantle: When you are mid (hopefully) you can think about skipping a mantle for a fast bottle.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Puck is a mid hero and can control runes very easily - thats why bottle is your friend.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: This is situational of course. Puck is a good Mek carry since he has a quite high mana pool.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Hex is a great item for puck as it allows you to burst down heroes that may otherwise escape.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: With Eul and Blink dagger you are almost unkillable. If the enemies have a lot of disables you could consider this (or as a cheaper alternative for hex).
ItemTooltips.dagon: If you want to go all out damage - this item is not a bad choice.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Not very common - but the bonus stat and improved ultimate can be worth the money.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Shiva synergises very well with puck. With his blink abilities he can ensure to hit a lot of enemies with shivas blast. The other attributes (mana+int) help him as well.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Since puck is very maneuverable with his orb - boots don't have a very high priority. BUT if you have mana issues you should definitely get arcanes quite early.

AbilityTooltips.puck_illusory_orb: Orb is your primary nuke in this build - max it first for maximum damage
AbilityTooltips.puck_waning_rift: As your secondary damage spell - max it after orb.
AbilityTooltips.puck_phase_shift: One level in phase shift early should be enough to avoid most ganks.
AbilityTooltips.puck_dream_coil: Well it is your ultimate ... so skill it whenever possible.
